entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who has removed his coat and is wearing an odd smock in the half light. He is talking to two children about magic outside school.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is a child who is sitting with Snape and another boy. She picks up a twig and imagines sparks trailing from it.

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is Lily's sister who does not believe in magic or Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a child who is sitting with Snape and Lily. He knows that Lily is imagining sparks trailing from the twig.

relationships.description: Snape tells Harry that they will get a letter when they are eleven.
Snape also tells Lily that they will get a letter when they are eleven.
Petunia does not believe in magic or Hogwarts, and she says Snape is lying to Lily.
